channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report X-2024090942
item.description:
Report X-2024090942

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-18T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-04
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN OAK CREEK, WISCONSIN, ONE FULLY MARKED AND LABELED DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING DURING THE TRAILER UNLOAD. DANGEROUS GOODS SHIPPING PAPERS WERE APPLIED TO THE PACKAGE AND HAD PASSED AN ACCEPTANCE AUDIT AT THE ORIGIN FACILITY IN MICHIGAN. THE PACKAGE CONTAINED SIX X ONE LITER BOTTLES OF VIO NEXUS ANTISEPTIC HAND SANITIZER. ONE BOTTLE WAS LEAKING APPROXIMATLY TEN OUNCES FROM A LOOSE CLOSURE. NO PHOTOS WERE OBTAINED OF THE LEAKING PACKAGE.
